DOC.brief_summary: This multicenter , observational study adult participant undergo different type elective surgical procedure require general anesthesia . During first study period , cross-sectional evaluation neuromuscular blockade level upon participant arrival Post Anesthesia Care Units ( PACUs ) . During second study period , hospital discharge data participant collect . The purpose study determine incidence incomplete postoperative neuromuscular recovery anesthesia PACUs Portuguese hospital . This cross-sectional retrospective study .
DOC.brief_title: Incidence Incomplete Postoperative Neuromuscular Recovery From Anesthesia ( P07535 ) ( Completed )
